meanings.sent1: The preparer of the meal carefully followed the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The preparer of the report ensured all the data was accurate.
meanings.sent3: The preparer of the surprise party almost spoiled the secret by accident.
meanings.sent4: She was the preparer of peace in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The preparer of the potion mixed the ingredients with precision.

meanings.definition: A person who makes something ready for use or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The preparer of the stage set up the props for the play.
meanings.sent2: The tax preparer helped individuals file their returns accurately.
meanings.sent3: The preparer of the treasure hunt left clever clues for the participants.
meanings.sent4: He was the preparer of opportunities for those in need.
meanings.sent5: The preparer of the exhibit arranged the artwork beautifully.
